biotools.summary: Program written in C++ that constructs datasets from NCBI data (GenBank). This uses the megaphylogeny method to construct extremely large datasets, but is convenient for small ones too.

bioschemas.name: PHLAWD
bioschemas.summary: Program written in C++ that constructs datasets from NCBI data (GenBank). This uses the megaphylogeny method to construct extremely large datasets, but is convenient for small ones too.
